title: Best of The Herd for 12/19/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 12/19/2019
description:
Colin gives Odell Beckham Jr. credit for saying the right things repeatedly this season even though he doesn't believe that he wants to stay in Cleveland. He thinks parity in the NBA is a joke and we already know what the NBA Finals will look like. He talks with Greg Cosell of NFL Films about why the Seahawks don't run through Russell Wilson, why Drew Brees isn't regressing and how Carson Wentz is still winning without any of his top WRs. Plus, Colin gives his top 3 picks of bowl season in College Football including both semi-final games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
